categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ziliss was a female Sith Sith Lord of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Third Galactic War, who functioned as a Imperial Reclamation Service enforcer. In 3626 BBY, she, along with fellow Imperials Dogah and Kodo, confronted the Commander, Arn Peralun, and Aryn Leneer when they arrived at the Dantooine Jedi Enclave to investigate the whereabouts of Darth Malgus. However, Ziliss and her companions were slain in the encounter.

Ziliss appears as a boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Onslaught expansion. She is only seen in the Republic storyline, as she will be replaced by the Republic Captain Meinar in the Imperial story.  In the Republic storyline, Ziliss can only be saved if the player is a saboteur secretly supporting the Empire. If she is saved, the droid NR-02 will convey Darth Xarion's thanks to the player, but mentioned that Ziliss still considered the player a “obnoxious, sanctimonious wart-hornet."
